nodes.text: Star Wars: Darth Vader: Together We Can Rule the Galaxy

Star Wars: Darth Vader: Together We Can Rule the Galaxy, also marketed as Darth Vader in a Box, is a collectible box set that includes a miniature Darth Vader painted figurine with display stand and a forty-eight-page illustrated paperback book featuring Vader's greatest quotes, with an introduction by Pete Vilmur. It was published by Chronicle Books in July 25 2012.

This one-of-a-kind, hand-painted Darth Vader statue in a classic force-choke pose, complete with a customizable display stand and a booklet of the Sith Lord's most chilling and inspirational quotes, is an essential totem for Star Wars fans or anyone wishing to master the dark side of the Force.
